title: Missed the JEE Mains rank submission deadline. Is there anything I can do?
content: Apart from trying through KCET, is there any other solution? Will e-mailing the admissions office help? I got 98.5 percentile in CRL Mains.

comments.body: Tbh it's a mistake on your part. The window was opened for a month after the results. Most probably they won't consider it
I realise it, but I guess it won't to much to grovel about it. If I can do something I will. I'm asking if there's a way out that's all, if there isn't, then so be it.
why tf u joining pes with 98.5
I paid to register, because the dean of our school forced us to. I thought might as well get the jee rank card?
When was the last date?
Apparantly yesterday before 10pm

When was the last date exactly 

I filled it a few days ago they did ask my jee percentage also for kcet but I haven't given that 

Paid registration fee too
I did it on the night of 21st I didn't know the deadline I thought it was 1st June
Won't get cs anywhere decent if general candidate
portal reopens tomorrow again. you can try reuploading
What time? I wanna be the first to re-upload this time lol.
hasn't been mentioned. prolly 10 am?
Idk why it's showing that "this session will only be activated after the JEE main session 2 results are announced".
did it change? did you submit the scores?
Yes, yesterday.
bro its showing "this session will only be activated after the JEE mains session 2 results are announced" today, but they said it will open on 28th when i asked on 25th.¬†
hey, I called the admission office today and they said it is still open to upload your jee scorecard, and yes I just uploaded mine too
Yes I submitted mine yesterday.
Is it possible to dm you? Cuz I wanted to know when we will be getting our ranksüò≠üò≠üôèüèª
did it reopen today?
